vlive.korean: 뭔가 어렸을 때부터 그 아메카지 그 히피의 느낌을 되게 풍겨보고 싶었어요 제가. I wanted to give off this American Vintage, hippy vibe since I was young. 듣기 View video 카모마일T (Chamomile_T) : ✈ 일본 도쿄여행 ✈ 캐리어 짐싸기 / 여행 필수품과 환전까지?
vlive.english: I wanted to give off this American Vintage, hippy vibe since I was young.

vlive.korean: 이미 여기서부터 뭔가 풍겨. - 그지? I can smell it even from here. - Right? 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : Global Working Tour in Australia EP.03
vlive.english: I can smell it even from here. - Right?

vlive.korean: 멋있는 아우라가 풍겨요. SHINHWA members did give off when they were actively promoting their albums. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 스칼렛과 뷰티수다떨기 겨울스킨케어&셀프관리법 Let's talk about skincare for winter season!
vlive.english: SHINHWA members did give off when they were actively promoting their albums.

vlive.korean: 정말 드라마 대박 기운이 물씬 풍겨나고 있습니다. which just means that this drama will be a huge hit. 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : 웹드라마 [악동탐정스] 제작발표회
vlive.english: which just means that this drama will be a huge hit.

vlive.korean: [수영 전문가 포스 물씬 풍기던] 물 진짜 깨끗해요! [Like a professional] The water is so clear! 듣기 View video TWICE : 나연 TV “나연이 하와이 갔나연?” EP.02
vlive.english: [Like a professional] The water is so clear!

examples.korean: The tantalizing aroma of fresh coffee wafted towards them. 발음듣기 갓 뽑은 커피의 감질나는 향이 그들 쪽으로 풍겨 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The tantalizing aroma of fresh coffee wafted towards them. 발음

examples.korean: wafts of perfume / smoke 발음듣기 풍겨 오는 향수 냄새/퍼져 나오는 연기 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
a bad smell exhaling from the kitchen 발음듣기 부엌에서 풍겨 나오는 나쁜 냄새. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a bad smell exhaling from the kitchen 발음

examples.korean: The aroma of coffee was wafted in. 발음듣기 향긋한 커피 냄새가 풍겨왔다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The aroma of coffee was wafted in. 발음

examples.korean: The smell of coffee floated up from the kitchen. 발음듣기 부엌에서 커피 냄새가 풍겨 나왔다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The smell of coffee floated up from the kitchen. 발음
